text.tspan: Step 1. As a team, decide upon a scenario.
(If this is your first game, do The Fall Guys)
Step 4. Distribute pawn and D6 to each player
Step 8. Set up noise and alert trackers
Step 9. Record your team on the ledger

flowRoot.flowPara: Declare the number of Escape Moves you need
- Exiting an Guard space costs one extra Escape Move per guard
- Cameras and Pressure Sensors have no effect during Escape.
- Each leftover 💡 you have may be used for 1 Escape Move.

After you have declared your Escape Moves and used up all of your 💡, you may roll your die. The number shown on the die is equal to the number of Escape Moves you may use to reach an Exit. If you still cannot reach an Exit, you are Busted.
You MAY pick up or drop off loot during the Escape Phase.
You MAY NOT use Help Out during the Escape phase.
You MAY NOT use abilities that cost 🔊 or ⚠ during the Escape Phase.
- Sub-actions may be played in any order
- Sub-actions may be interleaved with other players'
- May not undo once information is revealed
- Purchase for $1k, give to any character
